Pretty good content selection for Prime members, but this apps functions and usability is mediocre. For instance, you can't easily return a book to the Prime library. The only way I've found to do that is to download a new book, and if you've got your limit, it prompts you to return a book first. So you constantly have to shuffle and exchange books as you browse. I suppose this isn't an issue if you buy the ebooks, but as tool to enjoy their Prime offerings, it's ridiculously cumbersome.

And, as you try to tap to advance a page it goes BACK a page. It is plagued with tons of small probles like selecting when trying to swipe. Really needs a lot of work to clean up these issues but it is the only way to read many Amazon things so you are stuck with it and they don't care.

I want my shelf to only show the books not in a collection.  How the fricking hard is that?????
